title: Photograph, View of an altar in a side chapel of an unidentified church, 1904–13
title_raw: View of an altar in a side chapel of an unidentified church
description:
Designed by Leon Dabo (1868–1960); for J. and R. Lamb Co.
Vertical rectangle: A side chapel to the Virgin. A statue of her stands in the center of a tripartite reredos; the center being the largest section,-the altar of an arcade with engaged marble columns and center, an "M" in a quatrefoil. Fleur-de-lis on the wall and railing. A radiator, left.

Same church as 1961-83-4.

tombstone.epitaph: Photograph, View of an altar in a side chapel of an unidentified church, 1904–13. printed on sensitized paper. 1961-83-5.
